```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r load libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(gridExtra)
library(grid)
library(ggplot2)
library(lattice)
library(lme4)
library(gamm4)
```

```{r Read in data}
setwd('..') # set wd to one folder up, pm2.5_comp_ai master folder
om_ai_join = read_csv("data/county_concentrations/joined_dta/om_ai_join.csv")
```

## Secondary Analysis: Stratify by climate region (yes, all 9 but combining the Ohio Valley, Northeast, and Southeast Regions into one strata given the low number of AI-populated counties across these states.)

```{r table 1 check number of counties}
# check # of counties in West by county type
ai_county_fips = read_csv("../data/ai_counties.csv") 

nai_county_fips = read_csv("../data/nai_counties.csv") %>% 
  filter(!str_detect(County, "51515")) # drop Bedford City since it was incorporated into Bedford County in the middle of the study period

covariates = read_csv("../data/covariates.csv") %>% 
  mutate(County = str_replace(County, "46113", "46102")) # edit 46113 to 46102 to not drop counties

# edit 10/26/2022 select Western counties based on feedback from committee
ai_county_fips %>% 
  left_join(covariates) %>% 
  filter(State %in% c(53, 41, 6, 32, 16, 30, 56, 8, 49, 4, 35)) %>% 
  nrow()

nai_county_fips %>% 
  left_join(covariates) %>% 
  filter(State %in% c(53, 41, 6, 32, 16, 30, 56, 8, 49, 4, 35)) %>% 
  nrow()

```

## OM
### Stratify dataset by NOAA climate region
```{r dfs filter by climate region}
northwest_om_ai_join = om_ai_join %>% 
  filter(Climate_Zone == "Northwest")

west_om_ai_join = om_ai_join %>% 
  filter(Climate_Zone == "West")

northern_plains_om_ai_join = om_ai_join %>% 
  filter(Climate_Zone == "West North Central")

southwest_om_ai_join = om_ai_join %>% 
  filter(Climate_Zone == "Southwest")

upper_midwest_om_ai_join = om_ai_join %>% 
  filter(Climate_Zone == "East North Central")

south_om_ai_join = om_ai_join %>% 
  filter(Climate_Zone == "South")

east_om_ai_join = om_ai_join %>% 
  filter(Climate_Zone %in% c("Central", "Southeast", "Northeast"))

northwest_west_om_ai_join = om_ai_join %>% 
  filter(Climate_Zone %in% c("Northwest", "West"))
```

### Northwest
```{r run models}
# full adj model
om_full_northwest = lmer(om ~ county_type + as.factor(year) + 
                    popd_q + 
                    hhinc_q + 
                      (1|State/County),
                  data = northwest_om_ai_join, REML=FALSE)

## 95% CI: point estimate, LL, UL
paste(summary(om_full_northwest)$coefficients[2,1] %>% round(digits = 3),
      " (",
      round(summary(om_full_northwest)$coefficients[2,1] - 1.96*summary(om_full_northwest)$coefficients[2,2], digits = 3),
      ", ",
      round(summary(om_full_northwest)$coefficients[2,1] + 1.96*summary(om_full_northwest)$coefficients[2,2], digits = 3),
      ")", sep = "")

paste(summary(om_full_northwest)$coefficients[2,1] %>% round(digits = 2),
      " (",
      round(summary(om_full_northwest)$coefficients[2,1] - 1.96*summary(om_full_northwest)$coefficients[2,2], digits = 2),
      ", ",
      round(summary(om_full_northwest)$coefficients[2,1] + 1.96*summary(om_full_northwest)$coefficients[2,2], digits = 2),
      ")", sep = "")

# fully adjusted with interaction term for year
om_full_northwest_interx = lmer(om ~ county_type + as.factor(year) + 
                    popd_q + 
                    hhinc_q +
                    county_type*as.factor(year) +
                    (1|State/County),
                  data = northwest_om_ai_join, REML=FALSE)
summary(om_full_northwest_interx)

```

```{r om interX plot from lmer}
# create vcov matrix of main effects and interX
native_yr_vcov <- vcov(om_full_northwest_interx)[c(2,seq(37,53)), c(2,seq(37,53))]

# calculate all the variances for all the years i.e. var(x+y); should be 18 total entries
var_vector = c()
for (i in 2:18){
  var_vector[1] <- native_yr_vcov[1,1]
  var_vector[i] <- native_yr_vcov[1,1] + native_yr_vcov[i,i] + 2 * native_yr_vcov[i,1]
}
var_vector
sd_vector <- sqrt(var_vector)
length(sd_vector)
#matrix with 19 cols for 19 years, three rows: one for effect estimate of total effect per year (total effect = main effect + interx effect), one for CI lower, one for CI upper
om_decline_northwest <- data.frame()
om_decline_northwest[1,1] <- summary(om_full_northwest_interx)$coefficients[2,1]
om_decline_northwest[1,2] <- summary(om_full_northwest_interx)$coefficients[2,1] - 1.96*sd_vector[1]
om_decline_northwest[1,3] <- summary(om_full_northwest_interx)$coefficients[2,1] + 1.96*sd_vector[1]

# fill in matrix thru loop for every following year
yr_ct <- 37
for (i in 2:18){
  om_decline_northwest[i,1] <- summary(om_full_northwest_interx)$coefficients[2,1]+
    summary(om_full_northwest_interx)$coefficients[yr_ct,1]
  
  om_decline_northwest[i,2] <- summary(om_full_northwest_interx)$coefficients[2,1]+
    summary(om_full_northwest_interx)$coefficients[yr_ct,1] - 1.96*sd_vector[i]
  
  om_decline_northwest[i,3] <- summary(om_full_northwest_interx)$coefficients[2,1]+
    summary(om_full_northwest_interx)$coefficients[yr_ct,1] + 1.96*sd_vector[i]
  yr_ct <- yr_ct + 1
}

om_decline_northwest

colnames(om_decline_northwest) <- c('estimate', 'cl_lower', 'cl_upper') # set col names

om_decline_northwest$year <- seq(2000, 2017) # column for year


#PLOT OF TOTAL EFFECT OF NATIVE OVER TIME; updated 12/14 to be consistent with Figure 3 layout (slanted x-axis label)
om_northwest_interx_plot <- ggplot() + 
  theme_linedraw() + 
  geom_line(data = om_decline_northwest,
            aes(x=year, y = estimate)) +
  geom_line(data=om_decline_northwest,
            aes(x=year, y=cl_lower), linetype = "dashed") +
  geom_line(data=om_decline_northwest,
            aes(x=year, y=cl_upper), linetype = "dashed") +
  ylim(-1.1, 1.1) +
  labs(x = "Year",
       y = expression(paste("Mean Difference in OM (", mu, "g/", m^3, ")")),
       fill = "County Type") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 18),
        axis.title = element_text(size = 16),
        axis.text = element_text(size = 12),
        axis.title.x=element_blank()) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(2000,2017,1), expand = c(0, 0)) +
  guides(x =  guide_axis(angle = 45)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept=0, linetype="solid", color = "red")
om_northwest_interx_plot
ggsave("../figures/effectmod_plots/secondary/strat_climate_region/om_northwest.png", 
       width = 6, height = 4, dpi = 300)
```

for (i in 2:18){

  var_vector[i] <- native_yr_vcov[1,1] + native_yr_vcov[i,i] + 2 * native_yr_vcov[i,1]
}
var_vector
sd_vector <- sqrt(var_vector)
length(sd_vector)
# matrix with 19 cols for 19 years, three rows: one for effect estimate of total effect per year (total effect = main effect + interx effect), one for CI lower, one for CI upper
om_decline_southwest <- data.frame()
om_decline_southwest[1,1] <- summary(om_full_southwest_interx)$coefficients[2,1]
om_decline_southwest[1,2] <- summary(om_full_southwest_interx)$coefficients[2,1] - 1.96*sd_vector[1]
om_decline_southwest[1,3] <- summary(om_full_southwest_interx)$coefficients[2,1] + 1.96*sd_vector[1]

# fill in matrix thru loop for every following year
yr_ct <- 38
for (i in 2:18){
  om_decline_southwest[i,1] <- summary(om_full_southwest_interx)$coefficients[2,1]+
    summary(om_full_southwest_interx)$coefficients[yr_ct,1]
  
  om_decline_southwest[i,2] <- summary(om_full_southwest_interx)$coefficients[2,1]+
    summary(om_full_southwest_interx)$coefficients[yr_ct,1] - 1.96*sd_vector[i]
  
  om_decline_southwest[i,3] <- summary(om_full_southwest_interx)$coefficients[2,1]+
    summary(om_full_southwest_interx)$coefficients[yr_ct,1] + 1.96*sd_vector[i]
  yr_ct <- yr_ct + 1
}

om_decline_southwest

colnames(om_decline_southwest) <- c('estimate', 'cl_lower', 'cl_upper') # set col names

om_decline_southwest$year <- seq(2000, 2017) # column for year


#PLOT OF TOTAL EFFECT OF NATIVE OVER TIME; updated 12/14 to be consistent with Figure 3 layout (slanted x-axis label)
om_southwest_interx_plot <- ggplot() + 
  theme_linedraw() + 
  geom_line(data = om_decline_southwest,
            aes(x=year, y = estimate)) +
  geom_line(data=om_decline_southwest,
            aes(x=year, y=cl_lower), linetype = "dashed") +
  geom_line(data=om_decline_southwest,
            aes(x=year, y=cl_upper), linetype = "dashed") +
  ylim(-0.6, 0.6) +
  labs(x = "Year",
       y = expression(paste("Mean Difference in OM (", mu, "g/", m^3, ")")),
       fill = "County Type") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 18),
        axis.title = element_text(size = 16),
        axis.text = element_text(size = 12),
        axis.title.x=element_blank()) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(2000,2017,1), expand = c(0, 0)) +
  guides(x =  guide_axis(angle = 45)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept=0, linetype="solid", color = "red")
om_southwest_interx_plot
ggsave("../figures/effectmod_plots/secondary/strat_climate_region/om_southwest.png", 
       width = 6, height = 4, dpi = 300)
